column4: hi, I've just installed ubuntu 9.04 - can I run update? there is 261 updates - I'm just afraid, if my packages aren't going to downgrade (to 8.10).
it won't downgrade, but you should be aware that 9.04 isn't stable.  There may be things that completely break the desktop on a regular basis
I know, it's installed on my SD card - I'm just testing it :) thanks
